content:
TITLE: Importing EVM Wallet in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Code snippet demonstrating how to import the EVM wallet implementation in a JavaScript application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dynamic-labs/dynamic-global-wallet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import "<wallet-package-name>/eip6963";
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Importing Solana Wallet in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Code snippet demonstrating how to import the Solana wallet implementation in a JavaScript application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dynamic-labs/dynamic-global-wallet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import "<wallet-package-name>/solana-standard";
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing the Packaged Wallet in Test Project
DESCRIPTION: Command to install your locally packaged wallet in the test project, using the path to the .tgz file created earlier.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dynamic-labs/dynamic-global-wallet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install /path/to/your-wallet-package-1.0.0.tgz
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Test Project with create-dynamic-app
DESCRIPTION: Command to initialize a new test project using create-dynamic-app, where you can select either ReactJS or NextJS as the project type.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dynamic-labs/dynamic-global-wallet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx create-dynamic-app@latest
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Publishing the Wallet Package to npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to publish the configured and tested wallet package to the npm registry for public distribution.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dynamic-labs/dynamic-global-wallet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm publish
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Packaged Version for Testing
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a compressed package file (.tgz) for local testing before publishing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dynamic-labs/dynamic-global-wallet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm pack
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Package Version with npm
DESCRIPTION: Commands for updating the package version following semantic versioning principles before publishing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dynamic-labs/dynamic-global-wallet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm version patch  # for bug fixes
# or
npm version minor  # for new features
# or
npm version major  # for breaking changes
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building the Wallet Package with npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the wallet package, compiling source code into distributable format.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dynamic-labs/dynamic-global-wallet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning the Repository with Bash
DESCRIPTION: Commands for cloning the repository and navigating to the project folder to set up the wallet package development environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dynamic-labs/dynamic-global-wallet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone <repository-url>
cd <repository-folder>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies with npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all required dependencies for the wallet package project using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dynamic-labs/dynamic-global-wallet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```
